website_summaries.verdict: From school projects to family fun, this comprehensive kit is the one to get if you plan to do tie-dye with a large group.
pros: A generous tie-dye kit with enough accessories, including gloves, bottles, rubber bands, and dye for up to 36 shirts
Comes with a broad range of vibrant colors
cons: Not a practical choice if you aren't tie-dyeing with a lot of people

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a large group
customer_reviews.text: The results I've seen from those who came to the party have been great! I love that the mixing bottles have lines that tell you "to make purple, add red up to here and then blue up to here" etc. I thought I'd have to eyeball it but that was really helpful! I did end up getting extra gloves, but all in all it worked out very well. Price was a little high, but it's good quality and I have no other complaints so I'm generally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Allie Burgess

customer_reviews.title: Great price/quality product
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit to tie-dye with my art club (30 students). I bought this and the larger kit, as I wasn't sure how much I would need. This is the perfect size for a one time project in the classroom. Everything you need is included, except the shirts and buckets for soaking. Just be sure to tell students not to go crazy with the dye. They will get better results if they leave areas of white.
customer_reviews.author: artmom

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way
customer_reviews.text: I liked the kit but i was looking forward to more guidance no magazine or booklet provided and the QRC code provided in box didn’t work when prompted to use it stated “too many users for this month” if i paid for that i should have received that. The colors provided and empty bottles were cool
customer_reviews.author: Sagrario Rivas

customer_reviews.title: A Key to a Colorful and Fun Morning
customer_reviews.text: My students loved the kits and the results. Everybody was pleased. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Absolute hit at my sons birthday party. The colors were so vibrant and after a few washes still vibrant!
customer_reviews.author: M. D'Agostino

customer_reviews.title: Lots of family fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun for our family. Enough for everyone to do many projects. My granddaughter just started her first big project and is doing a set of full size sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McCann

customer_reviews.title: It was perfect for my tye dye birthday party I was able ...
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect for my tye dye birthday party I was able to do 5 shirts, a pair of leggings, some socks and a dress! (: The only think is I used a whole bottle of yellow just to make orange so that kinda sucks but I still have enough dye to do a-whole-nother batch. Highly recommend it though even with not having enough yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for group projects!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never tie dyed before but needed any easy art project for outdoor adventure camp. This fit the bill & the 17kids participating had a grand time creating v cool bandannas... easy instructions & everything in a v nice kit
customer_reviews.author: DKF

customer_reviews.title: This was incredibly easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about doing a tie-dye lesson with 20 visiting Israeli teens, having not done tie-dye myself since I was a kid. This was incredibly easy and fun. You need to buy buckets or plastic bins to soak the shirts in for 20 minutes with a solution (included) and a tarp or a grassy area that can get covered in dye. Otherwise, it was very fun and user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: PerchTwirl

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Jacquard dyes are the absolute best for long lasting, vibrant tie dyed t-shirts!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hester

customer_reviews.title: Complete kit
customer_reviews.text: The kit came with everything I needed for my project.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: The results were awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my second grade class with the help of 2 Moms. We followed the directions exactly. The results were awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The colors were very nice, and the shirts came out great! I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Toy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best dye around! Don't forget to use the soda ash lol!!
customer_reviews.author: jim lister

product_meta.title: Jacquard Tie Dye Class Pack
product_meta.description: Terrific for shirts, socks, wall hangings and more. Bright, permanent color. Easy, professional results. Dye kit includes turquoise, fuchsia and yellow dye in applicator bottles, fixer, gloves, rubber bands and instructions for 11 projects. Enough materials for approximately 36 shirts.
feature_bullets: Includes high quality textile art supplies

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars19 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
